This is a complete list of infinite games in balanced decks (same number of red and black cards) from 1 red card, 1 black card, to 21 cards of each. I've also included known infinte games for more cards but these aren't complete.

6:
000101111001
000110011110
001011010011
001011111000
001100101110
001100110101
001101100011
001101101001
001110110010
001111000110
001111100001
010001110110
010110011100
010110110100
010111001100
011001001110
011010010110
011011010001
011011100001
011100001011
011100101100
